meanings.definition: To calculate the average of a set of numbers.
meanings.sent1: She averaged the test scores to find the class average.
meanings.sent2: The teacher averaged the students' grades to determine their final marks.
meanings.sent3: When the calculator broke, she had to manually average the numbers.
meanings.sent4: His skill in math averaged out to be quite impressive.
meanings.sent5: The method to average numbers is quite straightforward.

meanings.definition: To have or show a typical amount or quality.
meanings.sent1: His performance in the game averaged above the rest.
meanings.sent2: The temperature in July averaged around 80 degrees Fahrenheit.
meanings.sent3: The cat's laziness averaged out to be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness averaged out to be a shining example for others.
meanings.sent5: The flavor of the dish averaged a perfect balance of sweet and savory.
